title: Kadavul Serthuvacha Lyrics Oru Kanavu Pola
stanzas:
<div>
Kadavul Serthuvacha Lyrics Oru Kanavu Pola

kadavul serthuvachcha
jodi thaanunga
kadal alai oayum varai
vazha vaazhthunga (2)

ini kaalamellaam
rendu perum
kai korthu nadakkanum
ada paththaam maasam
pakkathula pudhu
varavu kedakkanum.

nenjula nenappathellaam
nerula nadanthaale
soththu sogam thevaiyilla
sorgamum thavaiyilla

edhu ingae nerantharamo
evarukkum purivathilla
alli koduthaalum
anbu kuraivathilla

indha vazhkai oru kanavu
adhu kalanji pogalaam
ada anbu natpu kadhal
adhil kadavul paarkalaam

namakkunu vaazhugira
idhayam kedachuputta
vazhve yogamadaa
vaanam kooda valaiyumadaa

kadavul serthuvachcha
jodi thaanunga
kadal alai oayum varai
vazha vaazhthunga

ini kaalamellaam
rendu perum
kai korthu nadakkanum
ada paththaam maasam
pakkathula pudhu
varavu kedakkanum.

vazhkai oru muraithaan
vazhnthu paarthidanum
anbu uravugalaal
adha nee nerappidadum

edhaiyum thaangidathaan
manasa pazhakkikanum
tholil saanjikitte
thunbam vilakkikanum

manaivi endra peyaril
oru thaayum keedaikkuraa
ingu kanavan endra uravil
oru thandhai irukkiraan,.

kaalathin nadhi vazhiye
pogum payanamidhu
kalyaana thuduppeduthu
neendhi sellum oadam idhu

oorey kannu padum
nooru poruthamthaan
sanga Tamizh kodutha
kamban ...

ada uchchi mudhal padham
varai alandhu vachchathu
yaarunga.

indha ulagaththukke
kanakezhudhum
osaram ulla saaminga.
